trends: There have been 54 other sightings in Vancouver
There was one other sighting in Vancouver on or around April 22nd 2012
This sighting has been favorited 2 times.
Summary: Howering over woods, then ejecting second craft, one flying away, second one landing.
divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my friend where chilling at his back yard when we noticed a wierd light that was bigger then a star.It howered over the woods about 3 miles away,the light was sometimes yellow , sometimes white. It howered there for about 5 minutes then it made a bright flash, and kept on howering few seconds later a second light came out of the main light, the second one flew away to the left on a speed little bit faster then a plane.The second one kept on howering for about a minute, then it just landed in the woods.
